name: Pakistani Pot Roast Beef Fillets (Pasanday)
author: SRECIPE
summary: This beef is marinated with the mixture of flavorful spices with yogurt, which gives the beef an exceptional flavor. This is one of a Pakistani common meat dish. Serve hot with pita or Pakistani flat bread (Naan).
ingredients: 2 pounds round steak, cut into pieces
directions: In a medium bowl, combine yogurt, ginger garlic paste, pepper flakes, cumin, cloves, turmeric and salt
Mix in beef until evenly coated
Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat
Remove 1 tablespoon of onion, and set aside for garnish
Place meat in skillet, cover, and cook until tender, about 25 minutes
Check every 10 minutes, and add water if necessary
Pour in lemon juice, and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with cilantro, green chiles, and reserved fried onion
